FuncDef:
The common-name command configures a common name for an entity.
The undo common-name command cancels the configuration. The common-name command configures a common name for an entity. The undo common-name command cancels the configuration. By default, a PKI entity does not have a common name.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the common name of an entity.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters, including letters, numerals, apostrophes ('), equal signs (=), parentheses (), plus signs (+), commas (,), minus signs (-), periods (.), slashes (/), colons (:), and spaces.
